law.text:
The Secretary of State shall collect the following fees for services in connection with the land office:
For filing of a caveat .......................................................................................... $0.25
Judgment in cases of caveat, mandamus or other action affecting the land office or the land office duties of the Secretary of State, for filing copy of ................................................................................................ $0.25
Official certificate with seal of office affixed, for each patent .......................... $5.00
Plat and certificate of survey, for filing and registering, and issuing and recording patent thereon ........................................................... $2.50
Warrant, survey, grant, for copy of each ............................................................ $1.00
Copy of any other document (per page) ............................................................. $0.50
law.history: Amended 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 85, sec. 2, effective July 15, 1988. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 4013.
